experience.summary: Led the R&D and execution of strategic marketing initiatives to drive brand growth andcustomer engagement in the product suite.
Led the research and deployment of AI/ML solutions for AML and financial crime detection, improving system accuracy, reducing false positives, and automating SAR reporting.

Led the design and deployment of machine learning models for payment fraud detection and pricing optimization, while also developing graph-based analytics and freight cost optimization for enterprise clients.

Managed mission-critical risk platforms for major financial clients, ensured data integrity, and led large-scale data center migrations and automation projects to enhance operational efficiency and oversight.

education.summary: Thesis: Explanation andInterpretation of MachineLearning Models in FinancialCrime Detection.
